DOC.brief_summary: The 12-month study investigate cognitive training augmentation support employment improve cognitive performance work outcomes , expect result improve quality life community integration veteran mild moderate traumatic brain injury . The primary hypothesis compare veteran receive enhance supported employment , receive support employment plus cognitive training work week 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Work Outcomes Veterans With Traumatic Brain Injury
DOC.criteria: OEF/OIF veteran History mildtomoderate TBI ( loss consciousness < 6 hour ; posttraumatic amnesia < 7 day ) Documented impairment least one neuropsychological domain Unemployed , state goal work Written inform consent participate study Current alcohol/substance abuse dependence Participation intervention study
